item.title: Meet Dyson’s Brand-New Lineup: V8 Cyclone, V16 Piston Animal, HushJet Purifier Compact

review.headline_rewrite: Meet Dyson’s Brand-New Lineup: V8 Cyclone, V16 Piston Animal, HushJet Purifier Compact
bullets: The company just announced its biggest batch of new products yet during IFA Berlin, with new appliances coming to both its floor cleaner and air treatment lines.
From the already-announced PencilVac to an AI-powered robot vacuum and reimagined V8 Cyclone stick vacuum, the Dyson family of household appliances is about to get a lot bigger.
There's also a brand-new air purifier to come, plus updates to Dyson's existing fan and space heater models.
While all of these items were announced today, only the new air purifier—the HushJet Purifier Compact HJ10, which will retail for $350—will be available in 2025, by the end of this month.
Everything else will arrive sometime in 2026, with pricing still a mystery until closer to each product's release.
Here are the details of everything Dyson's got in store.

item.title: Paramount Plus Coupon Codes and Deals: Up to 50% Off

review.headline_rewrite: Paramount Plus Coupon Codes and Deals: Up to 50% Off
bullets: The trial lasts one week, is for new subscribers only, and can’t be paired with other offers.
You can stream all of the NFL coverage you want all season long, plus, 24/7 live channels are now streaming on Paramount+, so you’ll never need to give your brain the time to process the horrors.

item.title: Technology Sep 3, 2025 Prime suspect in the killing of United Health CEO appears as 'model' for men shirts on China's biggest online shopping website Shein is investigating after a likeness of Luigi Mangione, accused of murdering a UnitedHealthcare CEO, was used to model a shirt on its website. The image, likely AI-generated, was provided by a third-party vendor and quickly removed.

review.headline_rewrite: Technology Sep 3, 2025 Prime suspect in the killing of United Health CEO appears as 'model' for men shirts on China's biggest online shopping website Shein is investigating after a likeness of Luigi Mangione, accused of murdering a UnitedHealthcare CEO, was used to model a shirt on its website. The image, likely AI-generated, was provided by a third-party vendor and quickly removed.
bullets:
Chinese fast-fashion giant Shein has launched an investigation after an image of
Incidentally, this is not the first time that Mangione's likeness has caused a major company a headache.
In December 2024, the BBC complained to Apple after its new AI-powered "Apple Intelligence" feature falsely generated a summary stating that Mangione had shot himself.

Shein on Luigi Mangione 'moddeling' for the website
"We have stringent standards for all listings on our platform," the spokesperson said.

"We are conducting a thorough investigation, strengthening our monitoring processes, and will take appropriate action against the vendor in line with our policies." It is currently unknown how long the image was featured on the site or who the vendor was.
The image's origin remains unclear, but many online have speculated it was created using artificial intelligence (AI).

The BBC report said that BBC Verify used the facial recognition tool Amazon Rekognition, which found a 99.9% similarity score between the Shein image and a real photo of Mangione from his court appearance.

item.title: Judge Rules Trump Administration Illegally Canceled Harvard Funding

review.headline_rewrite: Judge Rules Trump Administration Illegally Canceled Harvard Funding

bullets:
Grammarly launches new AI agents to assist students and professionals with writing tasks
Grammarly has introduced eight new AI agents within its AI writing surface, 'docs,' designed to aid students and professionals with diverse writing tasks.
These agents offer functionalities like citation finding, plagiarism checking, and AI detection, alongside features predicting reader reactions and providing rubric-based feedback.
This launch signifies Grammarly's move towards agent-based AI to enhance writing across various platforms.
